pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, June 17, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a meeting of the Major Economies Forum on Energy and Climate, convened by the President of the United States of America, Joe Biden.

Closed to media

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of Senegal, Macky Sall.

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of Ghana, Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Premier of the Northwest Territories, Caroline Cochrane.
